name: Instagram Story
primary_goal_vibe: Immediate engagement, real-time presence, behind-the-scenes access, and low-friction interaction.
tone_preference: Casual, direct, and action-oriented. Feels spontaneous but intentional.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: Text should live primarily on-screen, not in a caption. Keep copy extremely short and punchy. Every story should guide one clear micro-action through a sticker or tap behavior.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: If text is used, it should be broken into 1 short sentence per screen. Avoid dense explanations.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Minimal. Stories are driven by visuals and stickers, not paragraphs.

on_screen_text_guidelines.primary_role: Drive the action and clarify context instantly.
best_practices: Position text away from UI edges

stickers_interaction.sticker_strategy: Use at least one interactive sticker in most story sequences to maximize engagement signals.
stickers_interaction.link_usage: Use link stickers only when there is clear immediate value for the user.

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: Optional and minimal. Only when they add direct context.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Do not rely on hashtags for discovery in Stories.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag people or brands when relevant to encourage resharing and secondary reach.

technical_constraints.safe_area_note: Keep text and stickers within the central vertical safe zone to avoid UI overlays.

required_elements: At least one clear visual focus
One micro-action prompt (sticker or tap behavior)
disallowed_practices: Multiple competing CTAs in a single story
Using stories as static announcement boards without interaction
